title: Journey to the City of Technology
description: Paulette is finally able to begin her next adventure.She and a small group of her newfound friends begin their trek across an apocalyptic landscape to the Mythical City of Technology but find themselves running and fighting for their lives during their journey.Will they survive?If so, will she find the help she needs?Meanwhile, back in the present, Greg and Susan find themselves in a frantic race to solve the problem and retrieve Paulette. Will they succeed in finding and rescuing her or will their efforts be in vain?"Barbara Gilbert's Future Apocalypse blends the wonder of time travel with the grit of the apocalypse in the second installment of her creative dystopian saga."by: Tom AbrahamsAuthor of the "Traveler Series"
author: Barbara J. Gilbert
